definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: For hydrophilic materials, the contact angle will be lower than 90 degrees.
sentences.chinese: 親水性材料的接觸角度會低於90度。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To prepare hydrophilic carbon black (HCB) and investigate its lymphatic targeting property.
sentences.chinese: 目的製備親水性納米炭並研究其淋巴靶向性。

sentences.english: The stability of different hydrocolloids and salts on fruit juice milk were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了不同親水性膠體和鹽類對果汁牛奶的穩定作用。

sentences.english: The researchers started out with tiny hydrophilic glass beads in an organic solvent.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員從有機溶劑中的細小親水性玻璃珠開始試驗。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the hydrophilic chemical constituents of Aster souliei(Franch).
sentences.chinese: 目的研究緣毛紫菀的親水性化學成分。

sentences.english: In this case, the selection was based on the molecules’ affinity for water.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，選擇是基於分子的親水性。

sentences.english: All these efforts have resulted in a more swimmable Charles River.
sentences.chinese: 而這些種種努力已成功提升查理斯河的親水性。

sentences.english: From their findings they predicted that an alkane that was long enough would eventually cross over into hydrophilicity .
sentences.chinese: 由此，他們推測，足夠常的烷烴最終會具有親水性。

sentences.english: B-CTA photograph of SEM proved its hydrophilicity.
sentences.chinese: CTA的顯微照片證明了它的親水性。

sentences.english: Hydrogels are a new kind of three-dimensional hydrophilic crosslinked polymers.
sentences.chinese: 高吸水性凝膠是一種新型的親水性的三維網絡聚合物。

sentences.english: The hydrophilic modification of PVDF microporous membrane is introduced briefly.
sentences.chinese: 同時簡單介紹了PVDF微孔膜的親水性改性。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, PEG shows hydrophilicity and biocompatibility.
sentences.chinese: 同時，PEG擁有親水性與生物相容性。

sentences.english: It also increases the hydrophilic property of the non-image areas.
sentences.chinese: 它並增強非印紋部份的親水性。
